title: Game crash and cannot reconnect now
body:
so i was just in the middle of a ranked game pushing the inhibitor turret enemy team has been aced 
the turret goes down
i cant move 500 ping
attempting to reconnect
black screen
and nothing
i cant reconnect to the game have tried 5 times and on different computers nothing so now im stuck on the screen asking me to reconnect to the game that it wont let me connect to anyone else having this problem

replies.body: What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

1. Does it display an error ?
2. Is the screen black and unresponsive for a minute or so then backs out to windows with client asking to reconnect ?
3. Is it possible someone in your house has taken up your bandwidth or created instability within your network ?
4. How would you rate your internet lately/whats ISP information, speed & Usage
5. Some system specs and more information would be great
